quote: If you only knew the magnificence of the 3, 6, and 9, then you would have a key to the universe. – Nikola Tesla
fact: Count the number of cricket chirps in a 15-second period, add 37 to the total, and your result will be very close to the actual outdoor Fahrenheit temperature.
joke: Can I watch the TV? Dad: Yes, but don’t turn it on.
